channel.title: 2024 on a neuro[log]
channel.description: Recent content in 2024 on a neuro[log]

item.title: Happy 2024 and more
item.description: Happy New Year I haven’t written here in donkey’s years. Again. It’s hard to find inspiration to write when the world has just gone to shit since such a very long time. Additionally, I’ve pretty much made my feelings on a host of subjects known for decades. I hate being repetitive. I loathe listening to repetition, and I revile having to sound like a parrot. WIth that said, I’ve recently felt the need to start writing and blogging again.
